    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Coulombov zakon</string>
            <string language="en">Electrostatics-Coulomb law</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Electrostatics-Coulomb Gesetz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Loi d'Electrostatics-Coulomb</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lei de Electrostatics-electrostatics-Coulomb</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Legge di Electrostatics-Coulomb</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελεθτροστατηθς-Coulomb νόμος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ley del Electrosta'tica-Culombio</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Sile med električnimi naboji, definicija Coulombovega zakona in vpliv nabojev ter razdalje na silo.</string>
            <string language="en">Forces between electric charges, definition of Coulomb's law and relation between distance, charge and force.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">coulombov zakon</string>
            <string language="en">coulomb's law</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">električni naboj</string>
            <string language="en">electric charge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">colos</string>
            <string language="en">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">elektrika</string>
            <string language="en">electricity</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kräfte zwischen elektrischen Ladungen, Definition 
des Gesetzes des Coulombs und Relation zwischen Abstand, Ladung und 
Kraft.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Forces entre les frais électriques, la définition
de la loi du coulomb et la relation entre la distance, la charge et la
force.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Forças entre cargas elétricas, definição da lei
do coulomb e relação entre a distância, a carga e a força.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Forze fra le cariche elettriche, la definizione di 
legge del coulomb ed il rapporto fra la distanza, la carica e la 
forza.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δυνάμεις μεταξύ των ηλεκτρικών δαπανών, του 
καθορισμού του νόμου του Coulomb και της σχέσης μεταξύ της 
απόστασης, της δαπάνης και της δύναμης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fuerzas entre las cargas eléctricas, la 
definición de la ley del culombio y la relación entre la distancia, 
la carga y la fuerza.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesetz des Coulombs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrische Ladung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektrizität</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la loi du coulomb</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'électricité</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">lei do coulomb</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">carga elétrica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-it">colos</string>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">colos</string>
          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
